entities.name: gryffindors
entities.description: The Gryﬀindors are watching fearfully as the scene unfolds in the classroom.

entities.name: slytherins
entities.description: The Slytherins look excited, contrasting with the Gryﬀindors' fearful demeanor.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is described as picking up Trevor the toad and dipping a spoon into Neville’s potion. He is also mentioned as looking sour after the Gryﬀindors burst into applause.

entities.name: trevor
entities.description: Trevor, initially described as a toad, undergoes transformation and is later referred to as a tadpole. He reappears fully grown after Snape pours a few drops from a small bottle.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville's potion is mentioned, and it is described as being green when Snape dips the spoon into it.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is thinking about what Malfoy said while climbing the steps to the entrance hall with Ron and Hermione.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is seething about Snape as he climbs the steps to the entrance hall with Harry and Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as climbing the steps to the entrance hall with Ron and Harry.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy's statement has an impact on Harry, who is still thinking about it while climbing the steps to the entrance hall.

relationships.description: Snape transforms Trevor from a tadpole back into his original form using a potion.
The Gryﬀindors burst into applause after Snape transforms Trevor, but their joy is short-lived as Snape deducts points from them.
Snape deducts five points from Gryﬀindor for helping Trevor, which wipes the smiles off their faces.
Malfoy's statement has an impact on Harry, who is still thinking about it while climbing the steps to the entrance hall.
